ModMetaData.name: [RHY] Overpower
ModMetaData.author: Rhynia
ModMetaData.description:
Homemade overpowered stuffs.
Features:
- Phase Snare: Teleport designated targets (across maps) to specific location, and stun them. - Thing Spawner: Automatically spawn things in the container. Needs ASF. - Wealth Converter: Convert items to silver or gold, rate 100%. Needs ASF. - Archotech Assembly: Some very powerful material. - Net Spawner: Spawn resource into the pipe network (VE). - Small Anomaly Facilities: Smaller version of Anomaly related buildings. - Orbital Platform: Create an orbital platform in the scanner, no incidents will happen on that map. - Hediff Giver: A building that gives a positive or negative hediff to pawns.
